data.actual_result: The first three options enable themselves again.
data.expected_result: Your previous settings were saved (everything disabled)
data.short_description: The "Display Images, Videos, and Lolcats," and "Link Preview" settings do not save if you disable them after closing Discord.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open User Settings - Open Text&Images - Disable every option in that panel - Tap 'Back' - Tap 'Text&Images' to verify that the changes were saved - Close out the app from your background - Reopen Discord - Open User Settings - Open Text&Images
